Text.text: 1. Import the copied cURL request into Postman
2. We can acually execute the request right away, but let's make it a bit more dynamic, go to the body tab and replace the value of Effective Date with the following '\/Date({{$isoTimestamp}})\/'

MessageStrip.text: This snippet uses a postman build in function to get the current timestamp and use it as the effective date instead of a preset value

Text.text: 3. Click the Pre request script tab and add the following code

MessageStrip.text: This fetches a Cross-site request forgery token and saves it in a variable called csrf-token

Text.text: 4. Click the Headers tab and replace the value of the x-csrf-token with {{csrf-token}}
6. Click the Authorization tab and set the type to Basic Auth
